review: I love it!  I love watching my Prime programming on my big screen.  I also love the access to Netflix, Hulu and other apps such at MLB.com (games that I subscribe to).
author: Patrick Martinez

review: Great product as long as you have prime. Lots of free movies and TV shows.
author: Christopher R.

review: Awesome and easy to use.  Have a Google Crome as well and prefer this because I dont have to stream from a device like I do with the Crome.
author: Todd Plajzer

review: Best purchase! I bought one for Fathers Day and myself!
author: Amanda Sunnarborg

review: Ratio price product and service, is very good!
author: Alfonso

review: Love the firestick bout it for the tv the kitchen but ended up swapping the roku 3 in the living room out with the firestick it seems to be much faster than the roku 3 and I can use my Galaxy Note 4 for voice commands
author: paula brown
